name: 6MM Genuine Cultured Freshwater Cultured Button Pearl Stud Earrings Great  Gift

reviews.name: 6MM Genuine Cultured Freshwater Cultured Button Pearl Stud Earrings Great  Gift
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these as a christmas gift. I was very impressed by the looks of them compared to the price I paid. As for the quality, I am guessing they are excellent. I really can't say because I am not the receipient of the gift. But overall I am pleased.
reviews.title: Great small purchase

reviews.name: 6MM Genuine Cultured Freshwater Cultured Button Pearl Stud Earrings Great  Gift
reviews.reviewText: The earrings met my expectations; I got exactly what I thought I was going to get. They were shipped quickly, and the packaging was nice.
reviews.title: They were very nice earrings.

reviews.name: 6MM Genuine Cultured Freshwater Cultured Button Pearl Stud Earrings Great  Gift
reviews.title: great

reviews.name: 6MM Genuine Cultured Freshwater Cultured Button Pearl Stud Earrings Great  Gift
reviews.reviewText:
I lost my good pair of earrings. They were a gift from my boyfriend. I knew it would break his heart, so I bought two pair so I could wear them for the holidays. The more expensive ones came first. They were so cheap looking, my bff noticed the quality right away. This person is legally blind. Two days later, however these earrings came to my door. What a surprise. They looked just like the ones my better half gave me.....So much so that I told the boyfriend about the loss, yes he was upset, that was expected....but he wasn't so hurt that I couldn't be forgiven.......
These earrings were beautiful. As fate would have it, We found the original pair......they were in my dresser drawer.
reviews.title: Better quality than the more expensive earrings
